about.title: About
about.subtitle:
Your trusted destination for quality products at amazing prices. We're on a mission to make online shopping lovely.

Shopvely — where every shopping moment feels lovely.

story.label: Our Story
story.title: Shop Smart, Shop Lovely
story.p1:
Shopvely is more than just an online store—it’s a place where shopping feels simple, beautiful, and enjoyable.
We believe shopping is not only about buying products; it’s about the experience and the feeling that comes with it.

At Shopvely, every product is carefully selected with quality, value, and trust in mind. Our goal is to make every purchase smooth, satisfying, and filled with a lovely experience.
story.p2:
From product selection to delivery, we focus on creating a platform where customers feel confident, happy, and valued.
That’s why Shopvely stands for quality, convenience, and a lovely way to shop.

We believe shopping should be an enjoyable experience. That's why we curate the best products, offer competitive prices, and provide exceptional customer service every step of the way.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about shopping, orders, shipping, and more.

faqs.noResults: No FAQs found matching your search.
faqs.contactCta: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer service team is here to help.

shipping.a1: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days within Dhaka and 5-7 days outside Dhaka. Express delivery is available for select areas.
shipping.a2: Yes! We offer free shipping on orders over ৳5,000. Standard shipping charges apply for smaller orders.
shipping.a3: Absolutely! Once your order is shipped, you'll receive a tracking number via SMS and email to monitor your delivery.

orders.a1: We offer a 30-day easy return policy for most products in their original condition with tags attached. Some items like undergarments and personal care products are not eligible for return.
orders.q2: How do I cancel my order?
orders.a2: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it by contacting our customer service. Once the order is shipped, cancellation is not possible.
orders.q3: What if I receive a damaged product?
orders.a3: If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us within 48 hours with photos. We'll arrange a replacement or full refund.

payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: We accept Cash on Delivery (COD), bKash, Nagad, Rocket, bank cards (Visa/Mastercard), and bank transfers.
payment.a2: Yes! All online payments are processed through secure, encrypted gateways. Your financial information is never stored on our servers.
payment.q3: Do you offer cash on delivery?
payment.a3: Yes! COD is available for all orders within Bangladesh. You can pay when your order arrives.

account.q1: How do I create an account?
account.a1: Click on 'Sign Up' in the header, enter your email and create a password. You can also sign up during checkout.
account.q2: I forgot my password. What should I do?
account.a2: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email. We'll send you a link to reset your password.

eligible.desc: To be eligible for a return, your item must meet the following criteria:

eligible.li2: It must be in the original packaging with all tags attached

process.title: Return Process

process.step2Desc: Pack the item securely and ship it to our returns address. Shipping costs are non-refundable.
process.step3Desc: Once we receive your item, we will inspect it and notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.
